com.example.icecream.utils

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.icecream.utils.InputStringValidator

  • public final class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for validating input string (e.g. username or password).
    Author:
    kemo

        This method is to get the validation responseState of a input String.
        Parameters:
        input - The input String.
        patternType - Defined regular pattern.
        maxLen - The allowed maximum length.
        minLen - The allowed minimum length.
        Returns:
        com.example.icecream.utils.InputStringValidator.ValState The defined validation result states.
